scripts.start: PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.docker-create: doctl k8s cluster create --region fra1 --node-pool "name=neocash-passby;size=s-1vcpu-2gb;count=1;auto-scale=true;min-nodes=1;max-nodes=3" neocash-passby --wait && doctl kubernetes cluster kubeconfig save neocash-passby
scripts.docker-push: doctl registry login && docker tag neut/neocash-passby registry.digitalocean.com/neut/neocash-passby && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/neut/neocash-passby
scripts.docker-patch: doctl registry kubernetes-manifest | kubectl --context do-fra1-neocash-passby apply -f - && kubectl --context do-fra1-neocash-passby patch serviceaccount default -p '{"imagePullSecrets": [{"name": "registry-neut"}]}'
scripts.docker-secrets: kubectl --context do-fra1-neocash-passby create secret generic person --from-env-file=.env
scripts.docker-update: yarn run docker-build && yarn run docker-push && yarn run docker-restart
scripts.docker-install: yarn run docker-create && yarn run docker-build && yarn run docker-push && yarn run docker-patch && yarn run docker-deploy && yarn run docker-serve
